titles.title: District of Columbia Fiscal Fairness Act of 1993
To amend the District of Columbia Self-Government and Government Relations Act to permit the District of Columbia to impose a tax on income earned by individuals who reside outside of the District.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on District of Columbia.

committee.name: House Committee on District of Columbia

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Fiscal Affairs and Health.

bill.summary: 3/3/1993--Introduced. District of Columbia Fiscal Fairness Act of 1993 - Amends the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Relations Act to permit the Council of the District of Columbia to impose personal income taxes on nonresidents.
